item.title: 01 Kubestronaut KCNA & KCSA
item.author: Author
item.description: KCSA Infrastructure Security summary Isolate critical applications on separate server for better security Restrict Docker port access with firewall rules and policies Apply least privilege to containers and secure Kubernetes dashboard Store sensitive data securely using Kubernetes secrets and RBAC Encrypt etcd data and use TLS authentication for protection Kubernetes Isolation Techniques Multi Tenancy with namespaces: different teams or project can use the same cluster without interfereing with others. Each team or project has its own namespace.
